title: It Has Been About Two Weeks And I Am Still Permanently Suspended...
body: Hey Riot, Just about a week ago I posted that my account had been permanently suspended, and I haven't seem to get any email for further details about why I was suspended permanently. Please help because I spent quite a lot of money on skins and stuff on that account and I really would like it back.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Your best bet to determine the cause of your ban would be to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support, a boards post won't be of much help as only the Player Support team can handle account related issues.

Please remember, perma bans are not given lightly and are only removed in the case of an error being made.
Actually his best bet now is probably to speak to the ACCC now. Assuming hes aussie I guess.

Well, did you submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)? Make sure you have the right email associated with your account by clicking your profile on the top right and going to **Settings**, and check your spam folder. If you are unable to log into the support site or the email was changed due to an account compromise, submit an account recovery ticket; the response will be sent to the email you provide in the ticket instead.
